build.beforeDevCommand: node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const path=require('node:path');const cp=require('node:child_process');const dirs=['.','ui','../ui'];const dir=dirs.find((d)=>fs.existsSync(path.join(d,'package.json')));if(!dir){console.error('Could not locate UI package.json from cwd:',process.cwd());process.exit(1);}const npm=process.platform==='win32'?'npm.cmd':'npm';const r=cp.spawnSync(npm,['--prefix',dir,'run','dev'],{stdio:'inherit'});process.exit(r.status??1);"
build.beforeBuildCommand: node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const path=require('node:path');const cp=require('node:child_process');const dirs=['.','ui','../ui'];const dir=dirs.find((d)=>fs.existsSync(path.join(d,'package.json')));if(!dir){console.error('Could not locate UI package.json from cwd:',process.cwd());process.exit(1);}const npm=process.platform==='win32'?'npm.cmd':'npm';const r=cp.spawnSync(npm,['--prefix',dir,'run','build'],{stdio:'inherit'});process.exit(r.status??1);"
